channel.title: Item.cfg [Custom item adding] help
channel.description: Hi I have a delta source and i added the death cape and the models and all of those into the client side now i'm trying to put it in the item.cfg on my server side and everytime i try to compile it, it works but everytime i run the server. It shows up this [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at ItemHandler.loaditemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.(init)(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main)server.java:113)[/code] This is the code for my deathcape in the item.cfg [code]item = 9119 Death Cape It's_an_item. 300 300 300[/code]

item.title: Item.cfg [Custom item adding] help
item.dc:creator: @john1716 john1716
item.description:
@john1716 wrote:

i know i did this but it shows error it has 15 numbers item = 9199 Death_cape It's_an_item 300 300 300 55 70 0 17 0 0 3 2 17 0 72 0 0 0 0

Read full topic

item.title: Item.cfg [Custom item adding] help
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

john1716:

ok i used item = 9199 Death_cape It's_an_item 300 300 300 55 70 0 17 0 0 3 2 17 0 72 0 0 but it still wont work

Do you not listen? There has to be 15 numbers after “It’s_an_item”

Read full topic

no spaces and you added an extra zero.

item.title: Item.cfg [Custom item adding] help
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:3, topic:407853”][quote author=john1716 link=topic=509138.msg3693658#msg3693658 date=1312299550]
Hi I have a delta source and i added the death cape and the models and all of those into the client side now i’m trying to put it in the item.cfg on my server side and everytime i try to compile it, it works but everytime i run the server. It shows up this Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at ItemHandler.loaditemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.(init)(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main)server.java:113)
This is the code for my deathcape in the item.cfg item = 9119 Death Cape It's_an_item. 300 300 300
[/quote]
Why did you stop adding the bonuses? There should be 12 more.

Oh yeah thats right i didnt even notice that lol

Read full topic

item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

It shows up this Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at ItemHandler.loaditemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.(init)(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main)server.java:113)
This is the code for my deathcape in the item.cfg item = 9119 Death Cape It's_an_item. 300 300 300[/quote]
Why did you stop adding the bonuses? There should be 12 more.
